about_the_game:
Whilst searching for his lost daughter, Harold Williams falls into the Backrooms. He must find her and escape, but he is not alone. Horrors wait for him in the dark.

Features

  • A single player horror survival game.
  • Story based off the legendary and terrifying world of The Backrooms.
  • Retro PSX style graphics.

Silent Rooms is a third person survival horror game that takes inspiration from Silent Hill 1 and takes place in the terrifying world of The Backrooms.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0.
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Silent Rooms - Chapter 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
